summary: Four episodes. A pilot is ready to change sex, but the doctor made an error. A woman is searching a partner for a dance contest. A worker seduce his boss wife. A guard is too much proactive and this will cause many troubles.
cast: Paolo Villaggio|Mariangela Melato|Adriano Celentano|Renato Pozzetto|Giovanna Ralli|Alberto Sordi|Sofia Dionisio|Luciano Salce|Ugo Bologna|Lilli Carati|Massimo Boldi|Marilda Donà|Gino Pernice|Giuliana Calandra|Jack La Cayenne|Maria Antonietta Beluzzi|Marcello Di Falco|Shirley Corrigan|Mafalda Berri|Angelo Pellegrino|Gil Cagne|Lucia Alberti|Roberto Brivio|Lello Bersani|Omero Capanna|Raffaele di Sipio|Barbara Magnolfi|Alberto Postorino|Carmen Russo|Luca Sportelli|Marcello Tusco
title: Los signos del zodíaco
